ModMetaData.name: Rejuvenate Surgery
ModMetaData.author: Ethereal
ModMetaData.description: Adds the Rejuvenate surgery, a way to reduce your colonists biological age. On success the procedure will make the patient 10% younger. For players who want to take their time and create the perfect colony. Also eases matchmaking since if age difference > 10 years colonists are much less likely to become lovers. This advanced procedure can only be performed by a Skilled Professional (10) and requires two glitterworld Medicines. The colonist Medical Care setting must allow use of glitterworld medicines. Only works on human colonists, not animals. A very small chance of failure exists, with the effect of ageing twice as much instead.
